mapper.insert: insert into note (user_id_send, user_id_receive, note_is_read, note_send_time, note_content) value (#{userIdSend},#{userIdReceive},FALSE,now(),#{noteContent});
mapper.select: select note_id as noteId, user_id_send as userIdSend, user_id_receive as userIdReceive, note_is_read as noteIsRead, note_send_time as noteSendTime, note_content as noteContent from note where user_id_send = #{userId};

select note_id as noteId, user_id_send as userIdSend, user_id_receive as userIdReceive, note_is_read as noteIsRead, note_send_time as noteSendTime, note_content as noteContent from note where user_id_receive= #{userId};
mapper.update: update note set note_is_read = TRUE where user_id_receive = #{userId} and note_id = #{noteId};
